translation.en: There is a secret test hidden within the SAT.
translation.zh: 在SAT测验里 隐藏着另一个秘密测验

translation.en: This test does not measure a student's aptitude,
translation.zh: 这个测验并不是为了评估学生的

translation.en: at reading, writing and arithmetic.
translation.zh: 阅读 写作和计算水平

translation.en: It measures a student's innate ability,
to lie, cheat, fight and kill.
translation.zh: （复仇 愤怒） 说谎 作弊 打架和杀人的天赋

translation.en: Those who score well are recruited into a secret paramilitary academy.
translation.zh: （高度机密） 成绩好的学生会被收入 一所军事化管理的秘密学校

translation.en: Some call them seductresses. Some call them spies.
translation.zh: 有人叫她们美色特工 也有人叫她们间谍

translation.en: Fools call them innocent. They call themselves D.E.B.S.
translation.zh: 笨蛋们说她们天真无邪 她们自称是少女特工

translation.en: Good morning, D.E.B.S. Attention, D.E.B.S.!
translation.zh: 早安 少女特工们 少女特工 听着！

translation.en: Attention! Emergency alert! That means report right now!
translation.zh: 听着 紧急警报！ 也就是说 立刻来报到！

translation.en: Right this second! You have no time to sleep, ladies!
translation.zh: 立刻过来！ 小姐们 没时间睡懒觉啦！

translation.en: Go, go, go!
-And I mean now, ladies! -Dominique.
translation.zh: -小姐们 就现在！ -多米妮克

translation.en: The world might be destroyed while you nap!
translation.zh: 再多睡一会儿 世界可能就毁灭了！

translation.en: Come on Dominique. Phipps is freaking out.
translation.zh: 快呀 多米妮克 费普斯先生要抓狂了

translation.en: -I need you guys up! -Five minutes.
translation.zh: -我要你们立刻起床！ -五分钟准备好

translation.en: And no boys allowed upstairs.
Out.
-What? -Let's go! I want everybody up!
-Janet. Five minutes. -Have you seen my gun?
translation.zh: -珍妮特 五分钟准备好 -你看到我的枪了吗？

translation.en: Move it, move it! Everybody in the house!
translation.zh: 快 房里的每一个人！

translation.en: What did I do with it?
D.E.B.S. Max here.
translation.zh: 少女特工队 我是麦克丝

translation.en: Amy, it's for you.
Hello. No. No! I'm not--
I'm not talking about this anymore.
Get out.
And take your clothes with you. I don't do laundry.
translation.zh: 把你的衣服也带走 我不是你的洗衣婆

translation.en: Let's go! Let's go, let's go!
Move it, move it, move it! I don't have all day, D.E.B.S.
translation.zh: 快 少女特工们 我没空跟你们耗

translation.en: I do not have all day!
Ten!
-Bobby, seriously, it's not a good time. -Nine.
translation.zh: -巴比 说真的 现在不是时候 -九

translation.en: -Eight. -When? When is a good time?
-Stop calling. -Amy!
-Five. Four. -I'm coming.
-Three. -After all we've been through?
translation.zh: 我们一起经历了这么多

translation.en: -Two, one. -Goodbye, Bobby.
I broke up with Bobby.
-What? -I broke up with Bobby.
-Oh, my God! Why? -He was just so boring.
He's an ass.
I like him. I think he's sweet.
translation.zh: 我喜欢他 我认为他很体贴

translation.en: -I'm just not in love. -What?
translation.zh: -我和他没有恋爱的感觉 -什么？

translation.en: I said, I want to be in love!
Why are you yelling?
-Hi, Amy. -Hi.
-Hey, Mr. P. -Don't call me that.
-Hey, Mr. P. -What's up, Mr. P?
translation.zh: -嗨 P先生 -P先生 你好吗？

translation.en: Bonjour, Mr. P.
Hey, can I get a farmer's daughter short stack and bacon, well done.
translation.zh: 我要三明治 单层小的 加全熟培根

translation.en: Tofu scramble, peach smoothie, non-dairy.
translation.zh: 碎豆腐 蜜桃奶昔去奶

translation.en: -Cheeseburger, extra pickles. -Coffee, black.
translation.zh: -芝士汉堡 多加阉黄瓜 -咖啡 不加糖和奶

translation.en: We have a special guest with us this morning.
translation.zh: 今天早上有一位特殊的客人

translation.en: -Ms. Petrie. -Ms. Petrie?
She never comes down here!
Ladies.
I just want to say what a pleasure it is to finally meet y--
translation.zh: 比特瑞女士 我只想说 很高兴终于能见到你

translation.en: No time for pleasantries.
Phipps, a matter of some urgency has come to my attention.
translation.zh: 费普斯 我注意到了一个紧急事件

translation.en: Lucy Diamond is back in the States.
-Oh, my God. -Oh, she is all--
You're kidding. I'm writing my thesis on her.
translation.zh: 不会吧 我的论文就是关于她的

translation.en: I expect to be kept in the loop on this one.
translation.zh: 我希望你随时向我汇报

translation.en: Let's show some hustle.
-I can't believe she's back. -Who's Lucy Diamond?
translation.zh: -不敢相信她真的回来了 -谁是露西戴蒙？

translation.en: Lucy Diamond.
She's the last surviving member of the Reynolds crime syndicate.
translation.zh: （情报部） 她是雷诺犯罪集团仅存的家族成员

translation.en: Her family did battle with the Schaffers,
translation.zh: 雷诺和沙费尔两大家族之间

translation.en: in a vicious blood feud that lasted a decade.
translation.zh: 有长达十年的浴血冲突 （沙费尔VS雷诺） （第2回合） （世仇矛盾愈加激烈）

translation.en: After her father's death, she inherited the keys to his kingdom.
translation.zh: 父亲死后 她继承了家族事业

translation.en: Illegal arms-running, smuggling, gambling,
translation.zh: 非法军火交易 走私 赌场 尤其擅长偷盗钻石

translation.en: and her specialty, diamond theft.
translation.zh: （非法团伙女魔头） （展览钻石失窃案）

translation.en: She's protected by a loyal band of mercenaries, led by this man,
translation.zh: 她受一群死忠手下的严密保护 带头的是这个人 斯考德

translation.en: Scud.
translation.zh: 带头的是这个人 斯考德

translation.en: It is believed Lucy Diamond was behind the plot to sink Australia in '99.
translation.zh: 我们认为露西是1999年 那场澳洲阴谋的幕后主使

translation.en: Three attempts have been made to apprehend her. All failed.
translation.zh: 我们曾三次想逮捕她 但都失败了

translation.en: In 2003 she went underground,
translation.zh: （最新已知行踪） 2003年 她突然淡出 从此再也没有她的消息

translation.en: and has not been seen or heard from since.
translation.zh: 2003年 她突然淡出 从此再也没有她的消息

translation.en: -Yikes. -That's not even the bad part.
translation.zh: -糟糕 -还没说到最糟糕的地方呢

translation.en: What's the bad part?
No one has ever fought her, and lived to tell about it.
translation.zh: 所有和她交过手的人无一幸存

translation.en: Peach smoothie, farmer's daughter, tofu scramble and cheeseburger.
translation.zh: 蜜桃奶昔 小三明治 碎豆腐和芝士汉堡

translation.en: Coffee.
So why do you think she's back in town?
translation.zh: 你觉得她为什么会回来？

translation.en: Our intel suggests she's in town to meet this woman. Ninotchka Kaprova.
translation.zh: 据情报 她是回来见这个女人 妮诺其卡卡波瓦

translation.en: Ex-KGB, now freelance assassin.
translation.zh: 苏联国安局前成员 现在是职业杀手

translation.en: They're scheduled to meet tonight, 2000 hours.
Find out what Lucy is up to. Strictly surveillance.
translation.zh: 你们去打探她的意图 密切监视

translation.en: Do not try to apprehend her yourselves. Max, you're in charge.
translation.zh: 千万别擅自试图逮捕她 麦克丝 你是队长

translation.en: Amy, you're second. And, D.E.B.S., be careful.
translation.zh: 艾美 你是副队长 还有 万事小心

translation.en: What does a reclusive criminal mastermind want
with a Russian trained killer?
translation.zh: 想要从训练有素的俄罗斯杀手 那儿得到什么？

translation.en: Your scheduled meet, 2000 hours.
-Where'd you find her? -Zeda tipped us.
translation.zh: -你怎么找到她的？ -塞塔给的消息

translation.en: Said she's available. She's in from Prague. Relocating state-side.
translation.zh: 说她现在单身 已经从布拉格来到国内

translation.en: -Assassin? -Check.
-Where's the meet? -Les Deux Amour.
translation.zh: -在哪儿见面？ -Les Deux Amours（情侣餐厅）

translation.en: Trendy, yet discreet.
Cancel it.
Why? It's all set up.
translation.zh: 为什么 都安排好了！

translation.en: -I don't do blind dates. -Well, it's not a blind date...
translation.zh: 我才不会去相亲 这不是相亲 起码你知道她长什么样

translation.en: -...if you know what they look like. Okay? -Just tell her I'm not coming.
translation.zh: 这不是相亲 起码你知道她长什么样 告诉她 我不去了 说我临时有事

translation.en: -Say I came down with something. -Come on Lucy, it's been two years.
translation.zh: 告诉她 我不去了 说我临时有事 摆脱 露西 已经两年了

translation.en: -You have to get out there. -I am out there.
translation.zh: -你总得再试试吧 -我已经试过啦

translation.en: I went out with that drummer, the girl from the band that talked loud.
translation.zh: 我和那个说话很大声的女鼓手 约过会啊

translation.en: No, you didn't go out with her. We all went out together.
translation.zh: 那不是约会 我们所有人一起去的

translation.en: And then you lied and said you had food poisoning, and you went home early.
translation.zh: 然后你还撒谎说食物中毒 一早就溜回家了

translation.en: Yeah, well, she talked really loud, even when you were right next to her.
translation.zh: 因为就算坐在她旁边 她讲话还是很大声

translation.en: Look, I know what you're trying to do. You're trying to drown yourself
translation.zh: 我知道你想干嘛 你只想全身心投入在 你那毁灭世界的计划中

translation.en: in your little schemes to destroy the world but you need to get over it already.
translation.zh: 你只想全身心投入在 你那毁灭世界的计划中 但你该放手了

translation.en: -You were dumped. -I was not dumped.
Oh, you were dumped hard. And that sucks.
translation.zh: 你确实被狠狠地甩了 真不幸

translation.en: You took time off to go to Antarctica or whatever.
translation.zh: 然后你就躲到南极去 是冰岛的雷克雅未克

translation.en: Reykjavik. It's in Iceland.
But now it's time to get back in the game, Lucy.
translation.zh: 露西 现在是时候认识新的人了

translation.en: You've got a date tonight with a beautiful Russian assassin,
translation.zh: 今晚你要和一位漂亮的俄国杀手约会

translation.en: and you're gonna show up.
-Lucy. -Fine.
Okay, I'll go. I'll be there.
translation.zh: 好啦 我去 我会去

translation.en: Just promise me you'll be open.
translation.zh: 答应我 你会敞开心扉

translation.en: -Open to what? -Open to love.
Hey, look. Look. Check this out.
Ms. Petrie is handpicking girls for the International Bureau.
translation.zh: （少女特工外事处 需要你） 比特瑞女士亲自为国际署挑选女孩儿

translation.en: I'm gonna see if I can get an interview.
translation.zh: 我要看看我能不能去面试

translation.en: Do you think Mr. Phipps would let me take some time off after endgame?
translation.zh: 你说训练结束后 费普斯先生会让我休假吗？

translation.en: What are you talking about?
I don't know. There's this art school in Barcelona.
translation.zh: 就是… 巴塞罗那有所艺术学校

translation.en: Art school?
Amy, you're the perfect score. You could have your choice
translation.zh: 艾美 你成绩那么好

translation.en: of any assignment you want after endgame.
translation.zh: 结训后想要什么工作都没问题

translation.en: -Who's your best friend? -You are my best friend.
translation.zh: -谁是你最好的朋友？ -你是我最好的朋友

translation.en: And what did I say to you the very first day of academy?
translation.zh: 入学第一天 我对你说的第一句话是什么？

translation.en: "That's my bunk, bitch."
translation.zh: 臭丫头 那是我的床

translation.en: -Okay, after I said that. -"D.E.B.S. stick together."
translation.zh: -呃 那句话之后呢？ -少女特工共进退

translation.en: Exactly.
We've been through four years of hell and now we're top squad, right?
translation.zh: 四年里我们经历了这么多 现在我们是最强组合 对吧？

translation.en: We're just getting to the good stuff.
translation.zh: 我们现在才开始渐入佳境

translation.en: So you're not gonna ruin it all by going to art school.
translation.zh: 所以不要为了艺术学校 就毁了这一切

translation.en: -Am I right? -Yes. You are always right.
You need to put it here. Don't be an idiot for once.
translation.zh: 你必须把它放在那儿 这次别干蠢事好吗？

translation.en: You need to speak English or French.
"Fringlish" is not a language.
translation.zh: 法式英语不是一种语言

translation.en: -D.E.B.S. Janet speaking. Over. -Janet, put her on.
translation.zh: -少女特工 我是珍妮特 完毕 -珍妮特 让她听电话

translation.en: -It's Bobby. -I don't wanna talk to him.
-She doesn't want to talk to you. Over. -Bullshit! I need to talk to her.
translation.zh: -她不想和你说话 完毕 -狗屁 我要和她说话

translation.en: Copy that. He really needs to see you.
translation.zh: 知道了 他真的想见你

translation.en: He should not call her. It is embarrassing.
translation.zh: 他不该打电话来 真尴尬

translation.en: Bobby, I told you, it's over.
translation.zh: 巴比 我说过 我们完了

translation.en: -Over. No. -But we've gotta talk.
I'm serious. No.
Amy, we need to talk.
Jesus, Bobby, what are you doing here?
translation.zh: 天啊 巴比 你在这儿干嘛？

translation.en: You think you guys are the only ones onto Lucy Diamond? Everyone's here.
translation.zh: 你以为只有你们在监视露西戴蒙？ 大家都在这儿 联邦调查局 中情局

translation.en: The feds, the CIA.
translation.zh: 大家都在这儿 联邦调查局 中情局

translation.en: -Can't believe it. -This is our stakeout.
translation.zh: -怎么可能！ -应该由我们来监视才对

translation.en: Always sticking their heads in our business. It's unbelievable.
translation.zh: 大家都来插手 真不敢相信！

translation.en: Could you guys excuse us for a minute?
Why do you have to be such a jerk about everything?
translation.zh: 你为什么非要这么讨厌？

translation.en: Well, when my girlfriend breaks up with me for no reason,
translation.zh: 我和女朋友在一起八个月了 她突然无缘无故要分手

translation.en: after eight months, you'll excuse me I'm a little hostile.
translation.zh: -难免我说话不好听 -根本不是无缘无故

translation.en: -It's not for no reason. -Well then give me one.
translation.zh: -难免我说话不好听 -根本不是无缘无故 -那就给我个理由 -我需要更多

translation.en: I just want more.
translation.zh: -那就给我个理由 -我需要更多

translation.en: -More what? -I don't know.
-What are they saying? -I'm not gonna spy on them.
translation.zh: -他们在说什么？ -我才不要监视他们

translation.en: You are a spy, dipshit.
translation.zh: 你本来就是间谍 蠢货！

translation.en: -Is there somebody else? -No. There's nobody--
translation.zh: -是不是有第三者？ -没有第三者

translation.en: Because if there's somebody else, I swear to God--
translation.zh: 如果有 我一定把他…

translation.en: -I just-- -Speak.
I'm not in love with you.
Well.
I guess nobody's good enough for Little Miss Perfect Score.
translation.zh: 我想没人配得上你这位满分小姐

translation.en: Shut up!
Oh, yeah, you'll be back.
You can do this.
Why is it I can hold the whole world hostage,
translation.zh: 我能把全世界拿来当人质

translation.en: I'm scared of going on one stupid blind date?
translation.zh: 却会怕这该死的相亲 为什么？

translation.en: Because love is harder than crime.
Okay, now, knock them dead.
But not really.
Sure.
-Are you okay? -Hey, she's arrived.
Okay, we've got visual.
translation.zh: 我们看到她了 （发现目标）

translation.en: Hi. Sorry I'm late. I got lost.
translation.zh: 嗨 对不起我迟到了 我迷路了

translation.en: It is no problem. I was early.
translation.zh: 没关系 是我来早了

translation.en: -I have that sweater. -What?
I have the sweater she's wearing, but in taupe.
translation.zh: 她那件毛衣我也有 不过我的是灰褐色

translation.en: Really? Where did you get it?
translation.zh: 真的 你在哪儿买的？

translation.en: -Target. -No way.
Silence!
I'll have the Cobb.
And some wine.
-Do you want wine? -Vodka.
Vodka. Please.
Lucy Diamond, she's...
translation.zh: 哇 露西戴蒙 她真…

translation.en: -What? -Real.
-I never thought I'd see her in person. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我从没想到会见到她本人 -是啊！

translation.en: They also have it in teal.
So you're an assassin?
How's that work?
It's mostly freelance.
So you basically, what, you kill, like, whoever?
Sometimes maim.
-Maiming's more. -What are they saying?
translation.zh: -只打不杀的比较多 -她们在说什么？

translation.en: They are talking about killing and how to kill and who to kill.
translation.zh: 在说杀人 如何杀人 要杀谁

translation.en: -Oh, God. -But I do it just to pay bills.
-Really? -Mostly...
...I want to be dancer.
-Yeah. Can I have my bracelet back? -What are you doing?
translation.zh: -对了 手链能还给我吗？ -你到底想干嘛？

translation.en: My dad got that bracelet when he graduated from Quantico.
translation.zh: 那是我爸从中央情报局毕业时得到的

translation.en: Greatest dance instructor in Russia, but I can't afford to pay, so he say,
translation.zh: 有次我想请俄罗斯最好的舞蹈教练 但付不起学费 所以他说

translation.en: "My wife is cheating on me. You kill her lover, I give you free lessons."
translation.zh: “我老婆有外遇 如果你杀了她的情人 我就免费教你”

translation.en: Fine, okay. Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh: 好吧 拿去 我的天

translation.en: First man was goat farmer, so I use goat shears.
translation.zh: 她第一个情人是养羊的 所以我就用羊毛剪

translation.en: Second man, he likes chickens, so I took six chickens and put in thro--
translation.zh: 第二个情人喜欢鸡 所以我在他的喉咙里塞了六只…

translation.en: -What's wrong? -Oh, you know, I just--
I'm feeling really ill. It's my stomach. I--
translation.zh: 我真的不太舒服 我的胃不舒服 我想我食物中毒了

translation.en: -I think I have food poisoning. -Are you blowing me?
translation.zh: 我的胃不舒服 我想我食物中毒了 你是在搞我吗？

translation.en: -What? -Off.
-Are you blowing me off? -No, no, no.
Let's do this.
-Was it something I said? -No. No. Look, I just--
translation.zh: -我说错话了吗？ -不是 就是…

translation.en: I just got back into town, you know? And-- And--
-And I just got out of this relationship-- -I'm not asking for relationship!
translation.zh: -我刚结束了一段关系 -我又不要什么稳定关系！

translation.en: It's not you. You seem really nice, you do. It's me.
translation.zh: 不是你的问题 你看起来真的很好 是我的问题

translation.en: Baby, I can change.
translation.zh: 宝贝 我能为你改变

translation.en: Guys...
I'm just not interested.
Then only you will die alone.
translation.zh: 那你会一个人死得很难看！

translation.en: Amy, Janet, head Lucy off by the kitchen. Me and Dom are gonna take the back.
translation.zh: 艾美 珍妮特从厨房拦住露西 我和多米妮克去后面拦截

translation.en: Mr. Phipps specifically ordered us not to engage her.
translation.zh: 费普斯专门命令我们不要和她交手

translation.en: Janet...
-Who here isn't gonna graduate? -Me.
translation.zh: -我们中谁还没达到毕业资格？ -我

translation.en: -Why? -I haven't earned my stripes.
Oh, would that be this thing here?
And why is that?
You need to give me a recommendation. I don't see why you just won't--
translation.zh: 我需要你的推荐 我不明白你为什么…

translation.en: Not what I asked.
I need to show courage in the face of unspeakable danger.
translation.zh: 我需要在极端危险情况下表现出勇气

translation.en: Exactly.
So quit your whining and follow my orders.
translation.zh: 所以别再啰嗦了 听我的命令

translation.en: Let's go!
Okay. I'll check the parking lot. You go that way.
translation.zh: 我去停车场 你去那边

translation.en: -Stay in communication range. -But Mr.--
You can do this, Janet.
Janet, are you there?
-Oh, shit! -Oh, my God.
-I am so sorry. -I'm so sorry.
-Oh, my God. -Oh, shit.
-You're Lucy Diamond. -You're a D.E.B.
translation.zh: -你是露西戴蒙 -你是少女特工

translation.en: You have the right to remain silent.
-You're reading me my rights? -Anything you say can...
translation.zh: -你在说我的权利？ -但你所说的话 将会成为呈堂证供

translation.en: ...and will be used against you.
-Okay, here's the thing. -Yeah?
-I am really not up for dying today. -Me neither.
translation.zh: -我今天真的不想死 -我也不想

translation.en: So I was thinking that...
-Why don't you put your gun down. -Put your gun down.
translation.zh: -不如你把枪放下？ -为什么你不把枪放下？

translation.en: You're the criminal, and I'm the cop, so I think I'm more trustworthy.
translation.zh: 你是罪犯 我是警察 理论上来说我比较有信用

translation.en: I was totally minding my own business on a stupid blind date,
translation.zh: 我只是去相亲 又没碍着你们

translation.en: when you guys decided to rain shit all over me.
translation.zh: 是你们来搅局 让我落得如此下场

translation.en: Wait.
-You were on a blind date? -Whatever.
-With that Russian girl? -What?
translation.zh: -和那个俄罗斯女孩儿？ -不行吗？

translation.en: Nothing. I just... I didn't know you were a--
translation.zh: 不是 我不知道你是…

translation.en: Why would you know?
-That really torpedoes my thesis. -Your thesis?
translation.zh: -那我的论文就砸了 -你的论文？

translation.en: I'm writing a term paper on you.
translation.zh: 我在写一篇关于你的学期论文

translation.en: -You're kidding me. -No, it's for Capes and Capers.
translation.zh: -你在开玩笑吧 -真的 那门课叫《官兵抓强盗：

translation.en: Gender Reconstruction and the Criminal Mastermind.
-It's a really popular class. -Oh, come on.
translation.zh: -是很受欢迎的一门课 -少来了！

translation.en: But it's hard because there's only anecdotal evidence about you.
translation.zh: 这门课很难 因为关于你的证据 仅限于传闻

translation.en: I mean, nobody's actually ever spoken to you.
translation.zh: 从来没人和你真正说过话

translation.en: Until now.
Right. Until now.
I'm sorry. I didn't get your name.
translation.zh: 抱歉 还没请教你叫什么？

translation.en: Amy. Bradshaw, D.E.B.S. Sector 1.
translation.zh: 我是艾美布莱肖 少女特工第一分队

translation.en: Lucy Diamond.
It's really nice to meet you.
You're still, you know, under arrest.
translation.zh: 不过你还是 你懂吧 被捕了

translation.en: -Am I? -Amy!
Or you could just let me go.
-I really couldn't. -Come on.
translation.zh: 我真的不能 别这样 难道你从没做过不该做的事？

translation.en: Haven't you ever done anything you're not supposed to?
translation.zh: 别这样 难道你从没做过不该做的事？

translation.en: -Amy, where are you? -I'm over here.
translation.zh: -艾美 你在哪儿？ -我在这儿

translation.en: Son of a bitch!
Are you okay? We couldn't reach you.
translation.zh: 你没事吧 一直联络不到你

translation.en: -I'm fine. -Well, what happened?
She was here.
-Lucy Diamond was here. -That's impossible.
translation.zh: -露西戴蒙刚才在这儿 -不可能

translation.en: If she was here, you'd be dead right now.
translation.zh: 如果是真的 你早就死了

translation.en: You guys...
Sweet Jesus.
Do you know what this means?
translation.zh: 你知道这意味着什么吗？

translation.en: You are the only one ever to fight Lucy Diamond,
translation.zh: 你是唯一和露西戴蒙交过手

translation.en: and live to tell about it.
What a disaster!
I am so sorry. Leave it to the D.E.B.S.
translation.zh: 对不起 剩下的交给少女特工们去收拾吧

translation.en: You're in town a week, and they're all over you, just grabbing--
translation.zh: 你回来才一个星期 那些特工就已经盯上你

translation.en: What?
-Really, what? -I met somebody.
I knew it. Okay. I mean, it was a little weird
the thing about the dance, but I had a feeling you and Ninotchka--
translation.zh: 关于跳舞的事很奇怪 但我觉得你和她…

translation.en: No, no, no. Scud, Ninotchka was a train wreck thing.
translation.zh: 不 她根本就是个疯女人

translation.en: I'm not following you.
Okay, first of all swear to me you're not gonna freak out about this.
translation.zh: 好吧 你得先答应我 你不会抓狂

translation.en: -Freak out about what? -You know, sometimes--
translation.zh: 对什么抓狂 我为什么会抓狂？ -你有时候会… -直接说啊 到底是谁？

translation.en: Oh, my God! Who is it?
translation.zh: -你有时候会… -直接说啊 到底是谁？

translation.en: Okay, what do you know about an Amy Bradshaw?
Amy Bradshaw. The girl from the smuggling op.
translation.zh: 艾美布莱肖 上次来查走私的女孩儿？

translation.en: -No. -No.
Oh, my God.
Amy Bradshaw?
Blond hair.
Plaid skirt.
She's a D.E.B. Okay, not only is she a D.E.B.
translation.zh: 她是少女特工！ 她不仅是少女特工 她还是少女特工队的典型

translation.en: she is the D.E.B. She is the perfect score.
translation.zh: 她不仅是少女特工 她还是少女特工队的典型 -她还是满分小姐 -什么意思？

translation.en: What is that supposed to mean?
Amy Bradshaw is the only person ever
translation.zh: 艾美布莱肖是史上唯一

translation.en: to get a perfect score on the secret test in the SAT.
translation.zh: 在SAT秘密测验里拿到满分的人

translation.en: -Give me the keys Scud. -Are you listening to me?
Perfect score means perfect spy.
translation.zh: 成绩好就表示间谍功夫好

translation.en: She is their pride and joy, she is literally their poster child.
translation.zh: 她是模范学生 大家学习的对象

translation.en: Well, their poster child doesn't know it yet, but she's into me.
translation.zh: 是不是模范学生没关系 重要的是她对我有兴趣

translation.en: You can't be serious. Would you say back on the horse?
translation.zh: -你不是认真的 -你自己想办法回去好吗？

translation.en: Where are you going?
Back.
P.S. She's straight!
You stay here.
Lucy, I beg of you--
All right, D.E.B.S. Show me what you're made of.
translation.zh: （少女特工队防护罩已启动） 让我见识见识少女特工有多大能耐

translation.en: -Amy. -Oh, my God!
Jesus!
Okay, just hold on.
-What are you doing here? -I wanted to see you.
Why?
Well, I was thinking about what you said about your paper.
translation.zh: 我想了想 你说过你的论文

translation.en: My thesis?
I think it's stupid for you to do outdated research,
translation.zh: 对 如果你能直接得到一手资料

translation.en: when you could come straight to the source.
translation.zh: 何必费心去研究一大堆过时的资料

translation.en: You?
Come out with me. I'll let you ask me anything.
translation.zh: 跟我出去 你可以问我任何问题

translation.en: -I can't go out with you. -Why not?
translation.zh: -我不能跟你出去 -为什么不行？

translation.en: Like, a zillion reasons.
Well, you have to come out with me.
translation.zh: 现在你必须得跟我出去

translation.en: Janet, what are you doing here?
translation.zh: 珍妮特 你在这儿干嘛？

translation.en: I don't know who that is, but he ruined my sweater!
translation.zh: 我不知道是什么人 但他弄坏了我的毛衣！

translation.en: -I don't know who you think you are. -Janet, no!
translation.zh: -你以为你是谁啊！ -珍妮特 不要！

translation.en: Did you go to Dalton?
Yeah.
-Where are you taking us? -Where do you want to go?
translation.zh: -你要带我们去哪儿？ -你想去哪儿？

translation.en: Home!
What are you doing?
Come on.
Look, these tunnels go on for miles,
translation.zh: 听着 那些隧道有几英里长

translation.en: so you guys could be lost in there for days, even weeks.
translation.zh: 想要自己走回去 得几天甚至几星期 还可能迷路

translation.en: Okay. Suit yourself.
I have to pee.
-Want a beer? -No.
Come on.
Sit down.
So how long you been a D.E.B.?
You're gonna have to talk to me sooner or later.
Look, I don't know what you expect to accomplish by bringing me here.
translation.zh: 我不知道你带我来是为了什么

translation.en: Lighten up. I know there are a load of questions you're just dying to ask me.
translation.zh: 能不能放松一点？ 我知道你有一堆问题急着想问我

translation.en: Come on, tell me about your thesis.
translation.zh: 来吧 谈谈你的论文

translation.en: -It's stupid. -Well, try me.
I guess my central hypothesis,
is that as a woman operating in a male-dominated field,
translation.zh: 我论文的中心假设是 一个女人

translation.en: you felt the need to overcompensate,
by being exponentially more ruthless and diabolical,
translation.zh: 你必须加倍的凶狠残暴

translation.en: than your established male counterparts.
I am not more ruthless.
I think an argument could be made that you are, i.e. we're here.
translation.zh: 我想我可以反驳说 你是 这就是为什么我们会在这儿

translation.en: That's interesting.
Continue.
And I think that these psychological forces combine
translation.zh: 我认为 基于你这些心理状况

translation.en: to create a kind of emotional void
translation.zh: 你正处于一种情感深渊

translation.en: in which you're incapable of loving or being loved.
translation.zh: 一个无法爱人和被爱的深渊

translation.en: -See, that is so not true. -What?
-I'm open to love. I am! -I'm sorry. It's just a theory.
translation.zh: -我可以爱和被爱 真的！ -对不起 这只是理论

translation.en: Well, what the hell do you know about it anyway?
translation.zh: 无论如何 你又怎么会了解我

translation.en: Nothing.
I just broke up with my boyfriend, like, five hours ago.
translation.zh: 我五个小时前刚刚和男朋友分手

translation.en: I'm sorry, that sucks.
translation.zh: 抱歉 你一定很难受

translation.en: Thanks.
Why did you break up with him?
I don't know, it just, it wasn't...
I think love should be irresistible, like a drug, you know.
translation.zh: 我认为爱应该像毒药一样 令人无法抗拒 当你爱上一个人时 你会无法控制自己

translation.en: I think when it happens you should just not be able to help yourself.
translation.zh: 当你爱上一个人时 你会无法控制自己

translation.en: I just...I wanted...
more. Yeah.
-Babbling. -No.
You're not at all.
This is so weird. I...
-Why aren't you killing me? -Not into that.
translation.zh: -你为什么不杀了我？ -我不喜欢杀人

translation.en: But you killed those agents in Antarctica.
translation.zh: 你杀了我们派去南极的特工 不是吗？

translation.en: They died of frostbite or something. I never even met them.
translation.zh: 我想他们是冻死的 我根本没见过他们

translation.en: -And those ATF guys in Peru? -Ebola.
translation.zh: -那在秘鲁的特工呢？ -死于埃博拉病毒

translation.en: You're so not what I expected.
translation.zh: 你和我想象中完全不一样

translation.en: Well, I think that's a good thing.
So, what's up with Ninotchka?
translation.zh: -那个俄罗斯女人又是怎么回事？ -一提起她我就头疼

translation.en: -Oh, God, she was such a headcase. -Where do you meet someone like that?
translation.zh: -那个俄罗斯女人又是怎么回事？ -一提起她我就头疼 -你怎么会认识那样的人？ -天呐！

translation.en: Yes!
Correct me if I'm wrong,
translation.zh: 如果我说错了 请纠正我

translation.en: but your friend appears to be hitting on my friend.
translation.zh: 你朋友似乎正在和我朋友搭讪

translation.en: -You're not wrong. -Yeah, but my friend's not into that.
So Bobby's just, like, all over me, and I just...
I just feel like he doesn't get me, you know?
translation.zh: 但我觉得他根本不了解我

translation.en: Do you ever feel like nobody understands you?
translation.zh: 你有没有过 这种根本没人懂你的感觉？

translation.en: Yes, all the time.
I am really glad I met you.
translation.zh: 我真的很高兴能认识你

translation.en: I'm really glad I met you too.
I should go.
Okay.
Am I gonna see you again?
Do you wanna see me again?
I mean, I'm breaking, like, eight federal statutes,
translation.zh: 和你一起坐在这儿说话

translation.en: -...being here with you right now. -Yes, I know.
translation.zh: -大概犯了八条联邦法律 -我知道

translation.en: I could get kicked out of the D.E.B.S. for this.
translation.zh: 我可能会被少女特工队扫地出门

translation.en: For what?
Oh, my God! She almost kissed you.
translation.zh: 我的天 她就要亲到你了！

translation.en: You almost let her!
translation.zh: 你差点就让她亲到你了！

translation.en: You owe me 50 bucks.
-Amy. -Take me home.
-It's okay. -Take me home.
-Amy. -What?
translation.zh: -艾美 -干嘛？ -我什么时候能再见你？ -你不会再见到我

translation.en: -Well, when can I see you again? -You can't.
translation.zh: -我什么时候能再见你？ -你不会再见到我

translation.en: -Come on. -I'm serious. We cannot do this again.
translation.zh: -别这样！ -我说真的 不可以再这样

translation.en: Amy.
I have to go.
I'm gonna come find you.
-What just happened? -Nothing happened.
She was totally going to kiss you. You're so into her.
translation.zh: 她真的是要亲你 你对她很有好感 我没有！

translation.en: I am not!
You violated a prime directive. Plus, hello, it's a girl.
translation.zh: 你违反了最高指令 更糟糕的是 她是女的！

translation.en: -You're so busted. -No, I'm not.
You violated the section codes as much as me.
translation.zh: 你也违反了很多条规定

translation.en: D.E.B.S. Code Section 1, Article 2
translation.zh: 少女特工队法则第一节第一章第二条

translation.en: "D.E.B.S. will not consort with a known enemy, under penalty of treason."
translation.zh: 少女特工不能和任何敌方有任何交往 -否则按叛乱罪论处 -我没和他交往！

translation.en: I was not consorting.
translation.zh: -否则按叛乱罪论处 -我没和他交往！

translation.en: -You exchanged e-mails with Scud. -That's not the same.
translation.zh: -你和斯考德交换了邮箱 -这不一样

translation.en: You got drunk and nearly got the chancellor of Bulgaria killed.
translation.zh: 上次你喝醉了 差点害保加利亚大使被刺杀

translation.en: -That wasn't my fault. -Remember how I covered for you?
translation.zh: -那不是我的错 -我记得我帮你隐瞒吗？

translation.en: I never told anybody. If Max found about that,
translation.zh: -我没告诉任何人 -但… 如果麦克丝知道了 你永远也得不到胸章 也休想毕业

translation.en: you would never ever get your stripes and never graduate.
translation.zh: 如果麦克丝知道了 你永远也得不到胸章 也休想毕业

translation.en: -I can't believe you. -Not a word. Nothing happened.
translation.zh: -真不敢相信 -别说出去 什么也没发生

translation.en: Where have you been?
I couldn't sleep, so I took a walk.
translation.zh: 我睡不着 出去走走

translation.en: I was really upset,
about Bobby.
Yeah, Bobby.
Oh, yeah. I forgot, I'm sorry.
-Are you okay? -Yeah, I'm fine.
Good.
You know, I can't stop thinking about Lucy Diamond.
translation.zh: 我不禁一直想起露西戴蒙

translation.en: -You too? -Yeah, I feel like she's playing...
...some type of sick game of cat and mouse with us.
translation.zh: 在和我们玩猫抓老鼠的游戏

translation.en: I don't know.
Hey, but you guys be careful, okay?
Good night.
Yeah. Be careful.
Oh, my God, is it true? Did you fight Lucy Diamond?
translation.zh: 听说你和露西戴蒙交过手 真的吗？

translation.en: I heard you cut off her hand. Does she have her hand?
translation.zh: 听说你把她的手剁了 她还有手吗？

translation.en: Yes, she still has both of her hands. God.
translation.zh: 有 她两只手都在 天啊！

translation.en: -Everybody's talking about it. -About what?
translation.zh: -大家都在谈论这件事 -哪件事？

translation.en: How you met Lucy Diamond and lived to tell about it.
translation.zh: 你见过露西戴蒙 还能活着回来

translation.en: They're calling you a hero, when, really, you're a slut.
translation.zh: 大家叫你英雄 其实你是荡妇

translation.en: -You shut up. -A gay slut.
-I'm not gay! -Ms. Petrie wants to see you.
translation.zh: -我不是同性恋！ -比特瑞女士要见你

translation.en: What? Janet!
-What's going on? -Madam Petrie.
-She's coming down. -Here? Why?
translation.zh: -她马上过来 -这儿 为什么？

translation.en: She never comes here.
-Ms. Petrie, I would just like to say-- -Who are you?
translation.zh: -比特瑞女士 我想说… -你是谁？

translation.en: -Max Brewer. -Well, Max Brewer, my time is precious.
translation.zh: -麦克丝布尔 -麦克丝布尔 我的时间很宝贵

translation.en: -You're wasting it. Where's the girl? -Bradshaw comma Amy?
translation.zh: -你在浪费我时间 那女孩在哪？ -艾美布莱肖！

translation.en: You.
Excellent. Well, take one over here.
Right there.
Excellent. Sit.
Chill.
First...
-Amy. -Amy.
Let me just say how delighted I am to meet you.
When I heard that one of our own girls,
translation.zh: 我听说我们的少女特工之一

translation.en: had actually engaged Lucy Diamond and lived to tell the tale.
translation.zh: 居然和露西戴蒙交手还能生还

translation.en: I mean, Fred, over at Central Intelligence nearly peed his pants, he was so jealous.
translation.zh: 中央情报署的弗来德都要气死了 他很忌妒我们

translation.en: This stunt is really going to put the academy on the map.
translation.zh: 这件事让校方非常有面子

translation.en: Lisa from Interpol called to extend her congratulations.
translation.zh: 国际刑警处的丽莎来电道贺

translation.en: I'll bet.
This is just too much fun!
Now, Alice--
-Amy. -Amy.
We are going to need a description of the encounter.
translation.zh: 我需要你详细描述交手经过

translation.en: -The encounter? -Everything that happened...
translation.zh: -交手？ -每一个细节 任何微不足道或看似无关的细节

translation.en: ...no matter how small or seemingly irrelevant.
translation.zh: 任何微不足道或看似无关的细节

translation.en: -Why? -To develop a profile, of course.
Nobody's ever been this close to Lucy Diamond before.
translation.zh: 从来没人可以如此接近她

translation.en: You, for all intents and purposes, are our leading expert.
translation.zh: 你也因此成为了我们的顶级专家

translation.en: I don't think I'm an expert at all.
translation.zh: 我一点都不认为我是专家

translation.en: You underestimate yourself.
I took the liberty of accessing your private files.
translation.zh: 我未经你同意 调阅了你的私人档案

translation.en: -What? -"It's a Man's World:
Lucy Diamond and the Psychology of Cultural Criminality."
translation.zh: 露西戴蒙和她文化型犯罪的 心理分析》

translation.en: -Oh, God. -"Lucy Diamond...
...is at once a narcissistic sociopath and a victimized girl-child,
translation.zh: 自恋 反社会 缺乏父爱

translation.en: eternally searching for the love of her father.
translation.zh: 且急欲寻求父爱的女孩儿

translation.en: Her crimes could be viewed as a desperate cry for help.
translation.zh: 可以将她的犯罪行为 视为极度需要帮助的表像

translation.en: The more she steals, the deeper her feeling of emptiness."
translation.zh: 她偷得越多 就越觉得空虚无助

translation.en: -Annie-- -Amy.
I think you identify with Lucy Diamond.
translation.zh: 艾美 我认为 你懂露西戴蒙

translation.en: I think she sees your pathos.
translation.zh: 我认为 她可以洞悉你的心理

translation.en: You've got some dangerous union symbiosis going on.
translation.zh: 你们之间有一种危险的共存关系

translation.en: What's that movie with Jodie and the dog falls in the well with the lotion?
translation.zh: 茱蒂佛斯特演的那部电影 叫什么来着？ 她和一条小狗掉进井里 -《沉默的羔羊》 -你就是那只羔羊 艾美

translation.en: -Silence of the Lambs. -You're the lamb, Amy.
translation.zh: -《沉默的羔羊》 -你就是那只羔羊 艾美

translation.en: We can use that to our advantage.
I'm putting you in charge of this investigation.
translation.zh: 我将你任命为此次调查行动的负责人

translation.en: What?
You are hereby promoted to squad captain.
No.
Is there a problem?
Excuse me, ma'am, but I am the captain of this squad.
translation.zh: 对不起 女士 我才是队长

translation.en: -Miss...? -Brewer.
Brewer. There is a killer on the loose. There is no time for egos.
translation.zh: 布尔 现在有个杀人犯在逃 还谈什么自尊心

translation.en: This is not the Girl Scouts, this is espionage!
translation.zh: 这不是女童军 而是间谍情报工作！

translation.en: We have a chance to do something here.
You have a chance to do something.
Don't let us down.
Ready your troops.
You head out at 1400.
That's all.
Max!
-Max. Max. -What?
I didn't mean for this to happen, I swear to God. I don't even wanna be captain.
translation.zh: 我不是故意的 我发誓我根本不想当队长

translation.en: That's just it. You don't even want it.
translation.zh: 就是因为这样！ 你根本都不想

translation.en: Boys fall at your feet, the school kisses your ass,
translation.zh: 男生都仰慕你 全校人都拍你马屁

translation.en: and Mrs. Petrie makes you squad captain.
translation.zh: 比特瑞女士升你做小队长

translation.en: You'd be just as happy drawing in your stupid little book.
translation.zh: 你在自己的笔记本上涂涂画画 就已经很快乐了

translation.en: I don't understand why you have to take away the only thing I have going for me.
translation.zh: 我只是不明白 你为什么要抢走 我拥有的唯一一样东西

translation.en: -Oh, Max-- -Just--
Whatever.
It's fine.
-Just promise me one thing. -What?

translation.zh: 是价值1500万美元的遗失名画

translation.en: Insider sources say that the artwork was originally taken,
translation.zh: 知情人士称 这些艺术品当初是被

translation.en: by notorious supervillain Lucy Diamond.
translation.zh: 臭名昭著的大盗露西戴蒙盗走

translation.en: She's out there somewhere.
It's time for plan B.
-There's a plan B? -Yeah.
-Getting ready for tonight? -Hey, Mr. P.
translation.zh: -在为今晚做准备吗？ -嗨 P先生

translation.en: Tell me, Amy, how are you getting along?
Okay, I guess.
You know Amy, I've found that in this business,
translation.zh: 你知道吗 我发现干这一行

translation.en: there isn't much room for love.
translation.zh: 实在没有太多谈恋爱的空间

translation.en: Love requires trust, and trust requires honesty.
translation.zh: 爱情需要相互信任 而相互信任需要真诚

translation.en: -Mr. P., can I ask you a question? -Of course.
translation.zh: -P先生 我能问你一个问题吗？ -当然

translation.en: I got a perfect score on the secret test in the SAT.
translation.zh: 我在SAT的秘密测试中得了满分

translation.en: -Yes, you did. -But...
-...what does that test measure? -I'm sorry?
translation.zh: -你们到底想测什么？ -什么意思？

translation.en: I mean, Dominique is a sex addict.
translation.zh: 我是说 多米妮克是性瘾者

translation.en: Janet, she has a couple of shoplifting convictions.
translation.zh: 珍妮特有几次偷盗案底

translation.en: Max? Well, she's borderline psychotic.
translation.zh: 至于麦克丝 她可以说是个神经病

translation.en: But nothing in my past indicated that I'd be good at being a spy.
translation.zh: 但我的过往并没有显示出 我可以成为一名好间谍

translation.en: So, why did I get a perfect score?
The test measures your ability to lie.
translation.zh: 测验也会评估一个人说谎的能力

translation.en: You are a perfect liar.
Don't get me wrong. Perfect liars make perfect spies.
translation.zh: 别误解我的意思 会撒谎就能成为好间谍

translation.en: The rest we can teach, but subterfuge, that comes naturally.
translation.zh: 其他能力我们可以培养 但撒谎的本事是天生的

translation.en: Look, have fun tonight.
Endgame only happens once a year.
translation.zh: 结训晚会一年只有一次

translation.en: Enjoy yourself.
-Okay, what's the plan? -There's security here, here and here.
We'll infiltrate through the rooftop and take out the guards here.
translation.zh: 我们从屋顶侵入 然后解决这儿的保安

translation.en: Go through these vents, rappel down the elevator shaft,
translation.zh: 穿过通风道 再从电梯井垂降

translation.en: and then bungee-jump down to the dance floor.
translation.zh: 然后用伸缩绳荡进舞厅

translation.en: Okay, check. What next?
translation.zh: 好 明白 然后呢？

translation.en: "Tell her that you love her." Scud, that's your plan?
translation.zh: 告诉她 你爱她 斯考德 这就是你的计划？

translation.en: -That's not a plan! -War is easy. Love is hard.
translation.zh: -这算哪门子的计划！ -犯罪容易 恋爱难

translation.en: Okay, so how's this?
"My tour of duty behind enemy lines,
has taught me to remain vigilant to my core values:
translation.zh: 我的责任感告诉我 要坚持我的核心原则

translation.en: Bravery, loyalty and justice.
And so it is a great honor for me to accept this award..."
translation.zh: 荣获这个奖项是我莫大的荣幸

translation.en: Blah, blah, blah.
What if she really loves her?
I mean, what if Lucy makes her happy?
translation.zh: 如果露西能给她快乐呢？

translation.en: If you were really her best friend, you'd probably let her go.
translation.zh: 如果你真的是她最好的朋友 就应该让她自己选择

translation.en: You can't decide matters of the heart.
translation.zh: 感情的事 不是理性能左右的

translation.en: It is madness to try.
It's time.
Okay, so I just wrote down a couple words,
explaining our version of what happened
and expressing your gratitude at being honored.
translation.zh: 和表达你获此殊荣的感激之情

translation.en: And... I'm sorry that we've been fighting.
translation.zh: 对于之前的不愉快 我很抱歉

translation.en: It's just I really want what's best for you.
I know.
All right. Your speech.
Attention, D.E.B.S.!
Dudes!
Once in a blue moon,
an exceptional young lady comes along,
translation.zh: 我们中出现一位很棒的年轻女孩

translation.en: who truly exemplifies what it means to be a D.E.B.
translation.zh: 她充分发扬了少女特工的精神

translation.en: Discipline. Energy. Beauty.
translation.zh: 训练有素 热情活泼 美丽大方

translation.en: Lucy Diamond's been spotted infiltrating the--
translation.zh: 发现露西戴蒙已经侵入

translation.en: Secure every entrance to this place, every floor.
translation.zh: 所有入口和通道立刻戒备

translation.en: Nobody gets in or out without my say-so.
translation.zh: 没有我的许可 任何人不准进出

translation.en: Game over, Diamond.
I have spent my life defending this great country of ours
translation.zh: 我穷尽一生来保护这个伟大的国家

translation.en: and I have learned one thing:
That sometimes it's not on the battlefield
where true courage is shown.
Amy Bradshaw survived one of the worst tragedies
translation.zh: 一件不幸的事发生在这位少女身上

translation.en: that could happen to a young lady.
translation.zh: 但艾美布莱肖得以幸免于难

translation.en: Kidnapped,
held hostage,
-Matthews here. -We're not seeing her.
translation.zh: -我是麦休斯 -我们还没发现她

translation.en: Look again!
What fears she may have known, none of us can fully appreciate.
translation.zh: 她的恐惧 我们无人能体会

translation.en: But she has agreed to tell us part of what she learned, on her journey.
translation.zh: 但她愿意告诉我们 她在这次经历中所学到的

translation.en: It gives me great pleasure tonight to give our greatest honor,
translation.zh: 我很高兴今晚能 颁出我们的最高荣誉奖

translation.en: the Mary Jane, to our very own perfect score
translation.zh: 即玛莉珍奖 得主正是我们的满分小姐

translation.en: Amy Bradshaw!
Courage.
"Courage" is a big word.
translation.zh: 勇气是一个很抽象的词

translation.en: I did not know what courage meant to me
translation.zh: 直到我被禁锢了七天之久

translation.en: until I endured seven agonizing days in captivity.
translation.zh: 我才体会到勇气对我来说的… …意义

translation.en: Go.
captured and held hostage by a madwoman.
translation.zh: 我被一个疯女人抓去当人质

translation.en: -Report. -We've got nothing here.
It was a routine mission gone terribly wrong.
translation.zh: 一个例行任务出了差错

translation.en: I was separated from my squad and knocked unconscious.
translation.zh: 我和队友走散了 然后被击昏

translation.en: I awoke in the arms of the enemy.
translation.zh: 随后在敌人的环伺下苏醒过来

translation.en: Just the sound of my own desperate thoughts to keep me company.
translation.zh: 我只有自己绝望的呻吟相伴

translation.en: If there is corruption in this city, Lucy Diamond is behind it.
translation.zh: 所有的腐败案 都有露西戴蒙牵连其中

translation.en: If there is indecency to be found, she is the root.
translation.zh: 任何为人不齿的行为 她就是根源

translation.en: If there is evil in this world, its name is Lucy Diamond.
translation.zh: 如果真的有魔鬼 露西戴蒙就是其真身

translation.en: It's not until moments like this
when you are forced to take stock of yourself
that you see what you are made of.
It's not until moments like this
when you have to remember what's right and true
translation.zh: 你才会不断提醒自己 什么是正义和真理

translation.en: because it's moments like this when you discover
what it truly means to be a D.E.B.
translation.zh: 身为少女特工的真正意义

translation.en: Which is why I can't accept this award from you tonight.
translation.zh: 因此 今晚我不能接受这个奖项

translation.en: Because the truth is
the time I spent with Lucy Diamond were the happiest days of my life.
translation.zh: 和露西戴蒙在一起的这几天 是我一生中最快乐的日子

translation.en: And the only brave thing I've done this whole time
translation.zh: 迄今为止 我做过最勇敢的事

translation.en: is what I'm doing now.
So if you'll excuse me
I have a date with the devil.
-Oh, my God! -Was that in the speech?
No, that's not in the speech.
Son of a--
Hostile has escaped and is on the run heading towards sector 12.
translation.zh: 敌人逃脱 正向12区方向逃逸

translation.en: It's Lucy Diamond! She's here!
translation.zh: 是露西戴蒙 她来了！

translation.en: Everybody, run for your lives!
Let's do this.
-We've gotta stop meeting like this. -I'm so sorry. I didn't even know what--
translation.zh: -我们下次不能再这样见面了 -对不起 我根本不知道…

translation.en: Get a room.
-You are AWOL, soldier. -Max, please.
translation.zh: 小兵 你居然擅离职守 -麦克丝 不要 -别动！

translation.en: -Freeze! -Scud! -Yeah? -Not helping!
translation.zh: 斯考德 你在帮倒忙！

translation.en: -My bad. -Can't you see...
translation.zh: 我的错 你难道没看见 她就要脱离少女特工队了？

translation.en: ...she's breaking up the D.E.B.S.?
translation.zh: 你难道没看见 她就要脱离少女特工队了？

translation.en: What did I tell you the first time I met you?
translation.zh: 我第一次见你时说过什么？

translation.en: High-protein diets were overrated.
After that.
-That we'd always be friends. -I meant it.
translation.zh: -我们永远是朋友 -我是认真的

translation.en: Max!
If you break her heart, I will hunt you down and kill you.
translation.zh: 如果你伤了她的心 我会找到你然后杀了你

translation.en: Deal.
I'm counting on you to keep her honest.
translation.zh: 我会指望你让她不干坏事

translation.en: I will.
You guys better get going.
I never really liked you but I'm sad to see you go.
translation.zh: 虽然我从没看你顺眼过 但是你要走 我还是很难过

translation.en: -So where are you going to? -I think, Barcelona.
translation.zh: -你们打算去哪儿？ -应该是巴塞罗那吧

translation.en: I'll miss you.
-Can I have your room? -Sure.
Okay.
Rule the school.
I always do.
There's a service exit that way.
Good luck.
And, Amy,
be careful.
-Which way did they go? -They went that way.
-Don't say I never gave you nothing. -My stripes?
translation.zh: -可别说我什么都没给你哦 -我的胸章？

translation.en: -Really? -Really.
-Thank you! -You're welcome.
Okay, okay. That's enough, that's enough.
Okay.
So, I was wondering if maybe you wanted--
Yes!
I didn't ask you anything yet.
Whatever it is, yes.
translation.zh: 不管是什么 我都答应你

translation.en: Awesome.
